Home.title: Enthusiastic, communicative and passionate about successful projects.
Home.description_1: Hello, I'm part of the technology team at
Home.description_2: where I dedicate myself to creating incredible software solutions. I love turning ideas into reality, whether it's developing projects or solving complex problems.
Home.experiences: I have experience in various technologies, such as .NET, JS, TS, Python, Node, SQL, and I'm always ready to learn more and share what I know.
